transcript: Last year you also remember our shoes got wet. I got sand in my panties. We got in a big fight. You had a sore throat and we did not see the grenient.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Last year you also remember, our shoes got wet and I got sand in my panties and we got into a big fight.  You had a sore throat and we did not see the grunions.
